scripts.build: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm main/main.zkasm -o build/rom.json && npm run build:metadata
scripts.test:build:gasLimit:v1: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm main/main.zkasm -o build/rom-89128960.test.json -D TX_GAS_LIMIT=89128960
scripts.test:build:gasLimit:v2: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm main/main.zkasm -o build/rom-100000000.test.json -D TX_GAS_LIMIT=100000000
scripts.test:build:gasLimit:v3: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm main/main.zkasm -o build/rom-2147483647.test.json -D TX_GAS_LIMIT=2147483647
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run test:build:gasLimit:v1 && npm run test:build:gasLimit:v2 && npm run test:build:gasLimit:v3
scripts.test:bitwise: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm test/bitwise.zkasm -o build/rom-bitwise.test.json
scripts.test:comp: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm test/comp.zkasm -o build/rom-comp.test.json
scripts.test:utils: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm test/utils-getLenBytes.zkasm -o build/rom-utils.test.json
scripts.test:rotate: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm test/rotate.zkasm -o build/rotate.test.json
scripts.test:touched: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm test/touched-assert.zkasm -o build/touched.test.json
scripts.test:calldatacopy: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm test/opcalldatacopy.zkasm -o build/opcalldatacopy.test.json
scripts.test:mstorex: mkdir -p build && npx zkasm test/mstorex.zkasm -o build/mstorex.test.json
scripts.eslint: npx eslint tools/**.js && npx eslint counters/counters-executor.js
scripts.eslint:fix: npx eslint tools/**.js --fix && npx eslint counters/counters-executor.js --fix
